mapper.select: SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM s_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN s_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN s_role_resource rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN s_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
